item.description:
We're really excited to have local investor, business owner and long-time New England REIA member David Fleckner as our speaker.  David will be discussing his knowledge and experience as a landlord and property management company.   Last month you heard the ins and outs of student rentals and this month we are diving into traditional rentals in Massachusetts.  Dave has many years of experience as a landlord and knows the Massachusetts laws inside and out.  Make sure to bring your questions and business cards!

You Will Learn:
-When to choose a property management company
-How to keep your records
-How to be prepared for housing court
-How to manage the entire property
-Difference between a landord and property manager
-How to deal with tenants
-And much more

Speaker Biography

Name: David Fleckner

David has been in real estate investing and property management since August of 2008. His experience as an investor are in Buying, flipping, holding, and Property Management. ICW Development has 3 aspects of there company.  Buying properties to either flip or hold, a construction division and a property management division.  David is the director of property management for FirstLine Property management as well as Director of sales and operations for ICW Development.

David is well versed in all areas of Property Management. He has attended several courses in both property management and real estate.

Graduate of Allied Property Management course 2011
Fortune Builders Mastery Course 2010
Fortune Builder Rehab Boot camp 2010
Fortune Builders Marketing Boot Camp 2010
Alan Cowgills Private Lending 2011
Basic Real Property Management for Landlords (HAP) 2012
Neighborworks Community Leadership training 2011
Mr. Landlord Boot camp 2010
Licensed MA Real Estate Agent since 2010

North Worcester County Landlord Association Board Member (NWCLA) 2011
Current member of NWCLA
Current member of The Worcester Property Owners Association
Current member of the Elm Street Neighborhood Association (Fitchburg) 2008


Hope to see you all there!


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door


Ask about getting YOUR membership today!

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Do's & Don'ts of Property Management
